# performanceMode

**Instance Property**

The initial performance configuration of the data path when connected.

## Declaration

```swift
var performanceMode: WAPerformanceMode
```

## Checking the configured performance mode

- **init(performanceMode:)**: Initializes the parameters with defaults.
